title: vara vallabha ramaNa
sahitya:
vara vallabha ramaNa vighna haraNa sarasIruha caraNA mAm pAlaya


anupallavi

  hara mukhOtbhava suragaNa nAyaka hari vidIndrAdi harSa pradAyaka


caraNam    karadhrta kamala kadAri danubIjA pura pAshOtpala dAnyarucA dashana
smarasata sundara smara sakha kalAdhara shrtajana mandAra shrI lambOdara
